content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;

SELECT
MIN(electricRange) AS min_electric_range,
MAX(electricRange) AS max_electric_range,
AVG(electricRange) AS avg_electric_range,
COUNT(1) AS total_number_of_electric_range,
COUNT(electricRange) AS not_null_total_number_of_electric_range
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://entixcoviddl.dfs.core.windows.net/electric-vehicle-data/bronze/vehicle.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    vehicleId         INT 1,
    vin               VARCHAR(10) 2,
    modelYear         SMALLINT 3,
    make              VARCHAR(25) 4,
    model             VARCHAR(25) 5,
    electricRange     SMALLINT 6,
    baseMSRP          INT 7,
    vehicheTypeId     SMALLINT 8,
    cafvEligibilityId SMALLINT 9,
    vehicleLocation   VARCHAR(30) 10
) AS [result]
WHERE electricRange > 20 AND make = 'TESLA';
